Source.Name: perl-HTML-Form
Source.Summary: HTML::Form - Class that represents an HTML form element
Source.Description: Objects of the HTML::Form class represents a single HTML <form> ... </form> instance. A form consists of a sequence of inputs that usually have names, and which can take on various values. The state of a form can be tweaked and it can then be asked to provide HTTP::Request objects that can be passed to the request() method of LWP::UserAgent.
